PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-03982021-05-14,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  IRCC,  GAC,  TB,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCertain Fees in Respect of Travel Document Services and Consular Services (COVID-19 Pandemic) Remission Order
PrecisCERTAIN FEES IN RESPECT OF THE ISSUANCE OF TRAVEL DOCUMENT SERVICES AND CONSULAR SERVICES (COVID-19 PANDEMIC) REMISSION ORDER in order to remit fees relating to the urgent issuance and expedited delivery of passports and other travel documents for (1) Canadians abroad returning to Canada urgently as a result of the Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic; and (2) those in Canada who were seeking to travel urgently for reasons related to the pandemic, including the illness or death of a family member abroad, to take part in an aid organization’s humanitarian operation, or if they had other imminent travel needs (e.g., to provide services deemed essential).
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2021-0022 Publication Date: 2021-05-26
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Certain Fees in Respect of Travel Document Services and Consular Services (COVID-19 Pandemic) Remission Order
